definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 126:a. [[אַבְנֵט]]: described Jos:Ant. iii. 7. 2 as a sash wound round breast several times, and falling to the feet; in Targum SyrVer [[הֶמְיָן]] (Pers.) a money-bag wound round body Sta:ThLz. 1894, 236.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: — [[בּׂסֶר]]: 1. 2 read besarto0 (PS; syllable be uncertain [Nes, privately]; Polyglotts and Castell have bsarto0).
